summary:
You have 2 Files...
Outside Dungeon + All goodies you can find in Helgen Dungeon (Equips from enemys and such)
Character Creation Screen File (Before Alduin Attacks you)
descriptionHtml:
LOOK DOWN!!!!!!


After i tried to find some and such i didnt found it, 

Whats these Savegame Does:

These Savegame contains 2 Files:

Save Game 01 <---- Begin @Character Creation before Alduin attacks.
Save Game 02 <---- Begin AFTER Helgen Dungeon!!!!!

-------------
I was looting everything i could to get no overweight from the stuff i took, that contains food, gold, equipment weapons to start with....

Plus<---------------- This Savegame was Made WITHOUT any Modifications!!!!

These Savegames are 100% Clean from Everything, You start outside of Helgen Dungeon to go to Riverwood whatever, or you start a New Character...

----------
1. If You choose Savegame 2 Radalus Character, if you want to change Genter etc. 

For English Players: 

on You Keyboard Press ->   `   <----- Keyletters then write showracemenu and enter. then you can change your character

For German Players:

Auf eurer Tastatur drückt---->   ^    <--- Taste um zum Menü zukommen, dann schreibt showracemenu ein und enter dann character neu umgestalten.

2. if you choose savegame 1 prisoner then you have to make new character and the dungeon atleast, but no opening sequence...


Clean Savegames always nice to tryout new mods and such.... have fun!



Where do i place the savegames?


Unrar the download, place it to desktop where ever, and trhe savegames goes to->>>

Your PC Name-> My Documents-> MyGames-> Skyrim-> Saves


(i did that also for me to avoit everytime i re-install skyrim to avoit opening lol.....)
author: bardockssj
